channel.title: News on Zongqing's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in News on Zongqing's Homepage

item.title: One paper accepted at ICLR'20
item.description: Our paper “Graph Convolutional Reinforcement Learning” was accepted at ICLR’20. Congratulations to Jiechuan Jiang.

item.title: One paper accepted at TON
item.description: Our paper “NetVision: On-demand Video Processing in Wireless Networks” was accepted at IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking.

item.title: One paper accepted at AAAI'20
item.description: Our paper “Generative Exploration and Exploitation” was accepted at AAAI’20. Congratulations to Jiechuan Jiang.

item.title: One paper accepted at TMC
item.description: Our paper “Augur: Modeling the Resource Requirements of ConvNets on Mobile Devices” was accepted at IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing.

item.title: One paper accepted at NIPS'19
item.description: Our paper “Learning Fairness in Multi-Agent Systems” was accepted at NIPS’19. Congratulations to Jiechuan Jiang.

item.title: GENE accepted at ERL'19 as a Spotlight Talk
item.description: Our paper “Generative Exploration and Exploitation” was accepted at ICML’19 Workshop on Exploration in Reinforcement Learning (ERL’19) as a Spotlight Talk.

item.title: One paper accepted at NIPS'18
item.description: Our paper “Learning Attentional Communication for Multiagent Cooperation” was accepted at NIPS’18. Congratulations to Jiechuan Jiang.

item.title: One paper accepted at TMC
item.description: Our paper “CrowdVision: A Computing Platform for Video Crowdprocessing Using Deep Learning” was accepted at IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing.

item.title: One paper accepted at INFOCOM'18
item.description: Our paper “A Computing Platform for Video Crowdprocessing Using Deep Learning” was accepted at the IEEE International Conference on Computer Communications (INFOCOM) 2018.

item.title: One paper accepted at TON
item.description: Our paper “Cooperative Data Offload in Opportunistic Networks: From Mobile Devices to Infrastructure” was accepted at IEEE/ACM Transactions on Networking.

item.title: One paper accepted at MM'17
item.description: Our paper “Modeling the Resource Requirements of Convolutional Neural Networks on Mobile Devices” was accepted at the ACM International Conference on Multimedia (MM) 2017.

item.title: One paper accepted at TMC
item.description: Our paper “TeamPhone: Networking Smartphones for Disaster Recovery” was accepted at IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing.

item.title: One paper accepted at ICNP'16
item.description: Our paper “On-demand Video Processing in Wireless Networks” was accepted at the IEEE International Conference on Network Protocols (ICNP), 2016.

item.title: Summer Research at Army Research Laboratory
item.description: I spent this summer at Army Research Laboratory to build an emulation environment for deep learning based video processing in large-scale wireless networks.

item.title: Best-in-Session Presentation Award at INFOCOM'16
item.description: My talk “Cooperative Data Offloading in Opportunistic Mobile Networks” won the Best-in-Session Presentation Award in the technical session of Data Offloading at INFOCOM’16.
